DESCRIPTION: Gems can be placed into this Socket at a Rest Site to combine the Gem's effect with this card's effect.
A card in Stasis reduces its cost by 1 at the start of each turn. When the cost reaches 0, it is returned to your hand, keeping its modified cost for one turn.
Gems can be placed into Sockets in cards at a Rest Site.
Summon a Bronze Orb minion, who will perform actions at the end of each turn.  If a Bronze Orb is already in play, a new one is not created.
